04000000 00301B10 34000A68

04000000 00301B3C 4B180108

04000000 00301B10 D503201F 

[inf upgrade pts Method 2 force value]
04000000 00301B3C 52800C88 

[attack and move restore code]
04000000 0041CB9C 394872C8 
04000000 00459588 B9421E68 
04000000 00459648 B9421C08 

[attack and move always on]
04000000 0041CB9C 52800008

04000000 00459648 52800008
